option.DisplayText: {{G-g sequence|UD}} {{regenerative|Regenerative}} {{nanobots|Nanobots}} Mod: Verbosity of debug entries output to Player.log
option.helptext:
{{g|0}}: Only infrequnet entries will be sent to Player.log, and only for reporting on normal function. {{W|1}}: Debug entries will be sent to Player.log when certain functions are perfomed within this mod. {{o|2}}: More frequent Player.log entries for a wider array of functions, often tracing broad program flow. {{r|3}}: Even more Player.log entries including current internal values as they're passed around. {{R|4}}: {{R|Not Recommended}} | Maximum number of entries to Player.log including tracing common or frequent loops.
The value default is {{g|0}}.

option.DisplayText: {{G-g sequence|UD}} {{regenerative|Regenerative}} {{nanobots|Nanobots}} Mod: Also show debug entries in the Message Queue
option.helptext:
When enabled, debug entries will be sent to the Message Queue any time (with few exceptions) they would be sent to Player.log. At higher levels of verbosity, this can be {{r|very}} "loud" and spammy.
The default is {{w|Disabled}}.

option.DisplayText: {{G-g sequence|UD}} {{regenerative|Regenerative}} {{nanobots|Nanobots}} Mod: Show Regenerative Nanobots Mod internal debug information in relevant ShortDescriptions displayed in the [{{W|l}}]ook UI.
option.helptext:
When enabled, internal debug information relating to the "infused with regenerative nanobots" modification will be displayed when [{{W|l}}]ooking at anything with the relevant parts.
{{M|Ductape}}: {{W|Stats}}: Shows statistical information about the modification's performance.
The default is {{w|Disabled}}.

option.DisplayText: Enable popup messages for when and item is fully regenerated by {{regenerative|regenerative}} {{nanobots|nanobots}}.
option.helptext:
When enabled, items in the below categories whose hitpoints are {{g|regenerated to full}} by their applied "infused with {{regenerative|regenerative}} {{nanobots|nanobots}}" modification will have this fact announced by a popup.
It can be useful information to know when an item's hitpoints are {{g|fully restored}}, however this can get a little spammy when there are several items all taking chip damage and being regenerated over a short period of time.
The default is {{W|Enabled}}.

option.DisplayText: Enable {{g|regen}} popup messages for items that are Equipped.
option.helptext:
When enabled, equipped items will give "{{g|fully regenerated}}" popup messages.
The default is {{W|Enabled}}.

option.DisplayText: Enable {{g|regen}} popup messages for items that are in the player's inventory.
option.helptext:
When enabled, inventory items will give "{{g|fully regenerated}}" popup messages.
The default is {{W|Enabled}}.

option.DisplayText: Enable {{g|regen}} popup messages for items that are held by the player and marked important.
option.helptext:
When enabled, held items marked important will always give "{{g|fully regenerated}}" popup messages.
The default is {{W|Enabled}}.

option.DisplayText: Enable popup messages for when and item is {{r|restored from being cracked, rusted, or busted}} by {{regenerative|regenerative}} {{nanobots|nanobots}}.
option.helptext:
When enabled, items in the below categories that are {{r|restored from being cracked, rusted, or busted}} by their applied "infused with {{regenerative|regenerative}} {{nanobots|nanobots}}" modification will have this fact announced by a popup.
It can be useful information to know when an item has {{r|restored}} to a usable state, however this can get a little spammy when there are several items having these conditions applied and restored repeatedly.
The default is {{W|Enabled}}.

option.DisplayText: Enable {{r|restore}} popup messages for items that are Equipped.
option.helptext:
When enabled, equipped items will give "{{r|restored from being cracked, rusted, or busted}}" popup messages.
The default is {{W|Enabled}}.

option.DisplayText: Enable {{r|restore}} popup messages for items that are in the player's inventory.
option.helptext:
When enabled, inventory items will give "{{r|restored from being cracked, rusted, or busted}}" popup messages.
The default is {{W|Enabled}}.

option.DisplayText: Enable {{r|restore}} popup messages for items that are held by the player and marked important.
option.helptext:
When enabled, held items marked important will always give "{{r|restored from being cracked, rusted, or busted}}" popup messages.
The default is {{W|Enabled}}.
